sourcesContent:
Pending Application Requests

Name OfficialMail Phone Number Designation Role EmployeeId Aadhar Number Company Action
{{request.username}} {{request.officialEmail}} {{request.phoneNumber}} {{request.designation}} Motorist Rider {{request.employeeeId}} {{request.aadharNumber}} {{request.company}} View
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import{ ApplicationRequest } from '../models/model.applicationrequest'; import { ApiService } from '../api.service'; import { ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { HttpClient, HttpErrorResponse, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-application-request', templateUrl: './application-request.component.html', styleUrls: ['./application-request.component.scss'] }) export class ApplicationRequestComponent implements OnInit{ applicationRequest:ApplicationRequest; applicationRequests:ApplicationRequest[]; statusOptions: string[]; constructor(private router: Router,private route: ActivatedRoute, private apiService: ApiService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getPendingApplicationRequest(); } selectRequest(request:ApplicationRequest){ this.applicationRequest=request; } getPendingApplicationRequest(){ this.apiService.getPendingApplications().subscribe( requests =>{ this.applicationRequests=requests; }, error => console.log(error) ); } getApplicationByUserID(userId: number): void{ this.apiService.getApplicationById(userId).subscribe( (applicationRequest: ApplicationRequest) => { this.applicationRequest =applicationRequest; }, (error:any) => { console.log(error); }); } updateApplicationStatus(status: string):void{ this.applicationRequest.applicationStatus = status; this.apiService.updateApplicationStatus(this.applicationRequest).subscribe(() => { this.router.navigate(['/application-request']) }, (error)=>{ console.log(error); } ) } }
